then.sendRequestSIP: ACK [URIf[lastCall-ID]([index])] SIP/2.0 To: [lastTo] From: [lastFrom] Call-ID: [lastCall-ID] [Via] Cseq: [lastCseqNumber] ACK Content-Length: 0
